markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 6" pfs="Standard">
[Stone to Flesh](/Spells.aspx?ID=311)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Earth" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=55" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 374 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** touch

**Target** petrified creature or human-size stone object
</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

Manipulating the fundamental particles of matter, you convert stone into flesh and blood. You restore a petrified creature to its normal state or transform a stone object into a mass of inert flesh (without stone's Hardness) in roughly the same shape.
name: Stone to Flesh

<traits>
<trait label="Earth" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=55" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<additional-info>
**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 374 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 
</row>

---

<summary>
Turn a creature turned to stone back to flesh.
</summary>
